Class CoinMaze

java.lang.Object
  GameModeImp
      CoinMaze
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameMode
public class CoinMaze
extends GameModeImp

A class that generates and monitors the state of a coin mode maze.

Author:
Bronte Kalebic

Parameters:

Returns:

getHint

public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getHint(Coordinate curr)
Generates a hint path to a random coin in the maze

Parameters:
curr - is the current position of the player
Returns:
an array list of the coordinates of the path to a coin closest to the player, excluding the coin position.
